sense.gloss: cram school, private tutoring school, juku
cram school student, student of a private-tutoring school
private school (in the Edo period, orig. run by Confucianists)
government-backed school operated by a scholar out of his home
private school for the study of English
lunch box brought to cram school, cram school lunch box
attending a cram school, commuting to a cram school
leaving a cram school, dropping out of a cram school
(private) part-time school for that prepares students for entrance examinations, cram school, prep school

sdata.j: あの↑子↑↓こ↓を↑無理↑↓むり↓に↑塾↑↓じゅく↓に↑通↑↓かよ↓わせるのは↑反対↑↓はんたい↓だね。
sdata.e: I'm against us forcing the child to go to cram school.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑塾↑↓じゅく↓はここから↑遠↑↓とお↓い。
sdata.e: My cram school is a long way from here.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑週↑↓しゅう↓に↑三↑↓さん↓↑回↑↓かい↓↑塾↑↓じゅく↓に↑行↑↓い↓く。
sdata.e: He goes to a tutorial school three days a week.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑塾↑↓じゅく↓で↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓している。
sdata.e: He studies at a cram school.

sdata.j: ↑塾↑↓じゅく↓の↑先生↑↓せんせい↓と↑付↑↓つ↓き↑合↑↓あ↓っている。
sdata.e: I am dating my cram school teacher.

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓↑塾↑↓じゅく↓の↑講師↑↓こうし↓を↑始↑↓はじ↓めた。↑主↑↓おも↓に↑数学↑↓すうがく↓と↑英語↑↓えいご↓の↑個別↑↓こべつ↓↑指導↑↓しどう↓をしている。
sdata.e: I recently started teaching at a cram school. Mainly I tutor maths and English to students individually.
I have to go to cram school.

sdata.j: 「トムって↑中学↑↓ちゅうがく↓↑受験↑↓じゅけん↓するんだってね。どこの↑塾↑↓じゅく↓にいってるの」「↑市内↑↓しない↓の↑塾↑↓じゅく↓に↑行↑↓い↓ってるよ」「どうやって↑行↑↓い↓くの？↑送↑↓おく↓り↑迎↑↓むか↓えしてるの？」「ううん。いつも↑自分↑↓じぶん↓で↑帰↑↓かえ↓ってくるよ」
sdata.e: You said that Tom is taking the secondary school entrance exam? Where is he going for preparatory school? "He's going to one in the city." "How is he getting there? Are you taking him to and from?" "No. He always gets there by himself."
